name: Southwestern-Flavored Ground Beef or Turkey for Tacos & Salad
author: Ben S.
summary: With Southwestern-Flavored Ground Beef, you can simultaneously make tonight's dinner and tomorrow's lunch. Just save out and refrigerate some of the taco meat and fixings such as shredded cheese and lettuce, plus chopped scallions and tomatoes. A good-looking salad like this will draw potential lunch traders. More likely than not, they'll be out of luck.
ingredients: 3 pounds lean ground beef or turkey
directions: Heat oil in a 12-inch skillet until shimmering
Add onion; saute until soft, about 5 minutes
Add garlic, chili powder, oregano and cumin; saute until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add beef or turkey and cook, stirring often, until it loses its raw color
Stir in tomatoes; simmer to blend flavors, about 5 minutes
Add salt and pepper, to taste
Stir in cornmeal; cook, stirring constantly, until it thickens, almost instantly
Cool and refrigerate (or serve warm for dinner as tacos or taco salad)
